solution_line_template: If Calvin had scored {calvin_score} points and Paislee {paislee_fraction} times as many points as Calvin, Paislee had scored {paislee_fraction}*{calvin_score}={paislee_score} points.
To have a chance of tying the game, Paislee had to score {calvin_score}-{paislee_score}=<<{calvin_score}-{paislee_score}={points_needed_to_tie}>>{points_needed_to_tie} points
